sentences.text: 2024 was dubbed the biggest election year in history. The vast majority of incumbent parties worldwide facing election in 2024 lost vote share, including in 2024 South African general election|South Africa, 2024 Indian general election|India, 2024 French legislative election|France, the 2024 United Kingdom general election|United Kingdom, the 2024 United States presidential election|United States, and 2024 Japanese general election|Japan, though, of those, only the incumbents in the United Kingdom and the United States lost power. 2024 Mexican general election|Mexico was one of the few countries where the incumbent party improved its vote share.

sentences.text:
The following indirect elections of head of state|heads of state and the upper houses of bicameral legislatures will take place through votes in elected lower houses, Unicameralism|unicameral legislatures, or electoral colleges:
* Since 29 September 2022: Elections in Lebanon|Lebanon, 2022–2025 Lebanese presidential election|President
* 2 January: Elections in the Marshall Islands|Marshall Islands, 2023 Marshallese general election#Presidential election|President
* 19 January – 28 August: Elections in India|India, 2024 Rajya Sabha elections|Rajya Sabha
* 25 January: Elections in Nepal|Nepal, 2024 Nepalese National Assembly election|National Assembly
* 25 February: Elections in Cambodia|Cambodia, 2024 Cambodian Senate election|Senate
* 26 February: Elections in Hungary|Hungary, 2024 Hungarian presidential election|President
* 9 March: Elections in Pakistan|Pakistan, 2024 Pakistani presidential election|President
* 27 March: Elections in Malta|Malta, 2024 Maltese presidential election|President
* 28–29 March: Elections in Tunisia|Tunisia, 2024 Tunisian National Council of Regions and Districts election|National Council of Regions and Districts
* 2 April: Elections in Pakistan|Pakistan, 2024 Pakistani Senate election|Senate
* 4 April: Elections in Belarus|Belarus, 2024 Belarusian Council of the Republic election|Council of the Republic
* 29 April: Elections in the Democratic Republic of the Congo|Democratic Republic of the Congo, 2024 Democratic Republic of the Congo Senate election|Senate
* 22 May: Elections in Vietnam|Vietnam, May 2024 Vietnamese presidential election|President
* 9 June: Elections in Belgium|Belgium, 2024 Belgian federal election|Senate
* 9–26 June: Elections in Thailand|Thailand, 2024 Thai Senate election|Senate
* 13–14 June: Elections in South Africa|South Africa, 2024 South African general election#National Council of Provinces|National Council of Provinces
* 14 June: Elections in South Africa|South Africa, 2024 South African presidential election|President
* 7 October: Elections in Ethiopia|Ethiopia, 2024 Ethiopian presidential election|President
* 13 October: ''Elections in Macau|Macau, 2024 Macanese Chief Executive election|Chief Executive''
* 21 October: Elections in Vietnam|Vietnam, October 2024 Vietnamese presidential election|President
* 31 October: Elections in Fiji|Fiji, 2024 Fijian presidential election|President
* 6 December: Elections in Mauritius|Mauritius, 2024 Mauritian presidential election|President
* 14 December: Elections in Georgia (country)|Georgia, 2024 Georgian presidential election|President
